name: Gerty
description: Carve your own path in a new rogue-lite that focuses on challenging combat in fully destructible terrains. Dive into the deep tunnels of a mining colony on your own, or in local co-op with up to 4 players. Purchase gear, level up your character, and gain powerful perks to eliminate the alien horde.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 10 Processor: 2.5 GHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Nvidia or AMD graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox 360 Controller (Other controllers might work to variable degree)
